thread.title: SRI International's Iris on the Move® Products Named "Security's Best" 2015 ASIS Accolades Award Winners
thread.title_full: SRI International's Iris on the Move® Products Named "Security's Best" 2015 ASIS Accolades Award Winners

author: admin
title: SRI International's Iris on the Move® Products Named "Security's Best" 2015 ASIS Accolades Award Winners
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/17/2015 @ 3:00 PM Companies mentioned in this article: SRI International 
MENLO PARK, Calif., Sept. 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SRI International's iris biometrics-embedded enterprise operations terminal and the KEES(TM) smart lock from Korea Technology and Communications (KT&C) and SRI were selected as 2015 ASIS Accolades - Security's Best winners. ASIS Accolades is an awards competition that recognizes the security industry's most innovative new products, services and solutions. This is the third time SRI security products have been recognized for excellence in this competition. 
The iris biometrics-embedded enterprise operations terminal combines access control, workforce management and customized applications to bring cost-effective security to enterprise operations. Iris on the Move® (IOM) iris capture technology licensed from SRI is embedded in the customized Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro hardware. The Android® computing platform can optimize physical access while adding a new level of personalization for business efficiency. 
KT&C's KEES residential door lock , powered by SRI's IOM technology, combines the accuracy of iris biometrics with the ease of a push-pull handle for simple, keyless access at a glance--eliminating the need to fumble for keys, enter a PIN or put down the groceries. KEES lock brings the security and convenience of iris authentication to residential properties. 
"SRI strives to deliver security products that combine ease of use and scalability for a broader range of market applications," said Mark Clifton, President, Products and Solutions Division, and Vice President, SRI International. "It is rewarding to have our efforts recognized by ASIS International." 
SRI will demonstrate the iris biometrics-embedded enterprise operations terminal and KEES door lock in booth #757 at the ASIS International 61(st) Annual Seminar and Exhibits (ASIS 2015) event, held Sept. 28-Oct. 1 at the Anaheim Convention Center in Anaheim, Calif. 
About SRI International SRI International creates world-changing solutions to make people safer, healthier, and more productive. SRI, a research center headquartered in Menlo Park, California, works primarily in advanced technology and systems, biosciences, computing, and education. SRI brings its innovations to the marketplace through technology licensing, spin-off ventures and new product solutions. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/sri-internationals-iris-on-the-move-products-named-securitys-best-2015-asis-accolades-award-winners-300145266.html 
SOURCE SRI International
